scripts.build: rimraf dist && vite build --outDir dist && serve -s dist
scripts.ssr-for-preview: rimraf dist && vite-pages ssr && serve dist
scripts.ssr-for-deploy: rimraf dist && cross-env GITHUB_PAGES_DEPLOY=true vite-pages ssr
scripts.deploy: npm run ssr-for-deploy && touch ./dist/.nojekyll && gh-pages -d dist -t
